original_definition: 'grease filtering efficiency' means the relative share of grease retained within the range hood grease filters;
generated_definition: 'grease filtering efficiency' means the ability of a range hood to filter grease and other contaminants from the air, classified into different efficiency classes based on testing in accordance with annex ii.

Article 2: ‘grease filtering efficiency’ (GFEhood) means the relative share of grease retained within the range hood grease filters;
‘grease filtering efficiency’ (GFEhood) means the relative share of grease retained within therange hood grease filters;
Article 3: the grease filtering efficiency classes shall be determined in accordance with point 2(d) of Annex I and point 2.4 of Annex II;
Article 10: The grease filtering efficiency classes of a domestic range hood shall be determined in accordance with its Grease Filtering Efficiency (GFEhood) as in the following Table 5. The Grease Filtering Efficiency of domestic range hoods shall be determined in accordance with point 2.4 of Annex II.
the grease filtering efficiency class of the model as defined in Table 5 of Annex I; the declared class shall not be more favourable than the class reported in the technical documentation in Annex V;

Thegrease filtering efficiencyclasses of a domesticrange hood shall be determined in accordance with its Grease Filtering Efficiency (GFEhood) as in the following Table 5. The Grease Filtering Efficiency of domestic range hoods shall be determined in accordance with point 2.4 of Annex II.
